title: Business Simulation-Based Causal Analysis and Strategic Planning Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary understanding of business processes and intermediate language proficiency
context.additional_context: Need for content optimized for smartphone-based learning. Non-real-time learning environment centered on text/images

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interactions between business variables using causal maps
Learners can establish market share optimization strategies by performing simulations three or more times
Learners can demonstrate profitability analysis and decision-making skills in a simulation environment without external support

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
